description: This API is in preview release for Amazon Connect and is subject to change. Updates the hours of operation.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

parameters.name: HoursOfOperationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the hours of operation.

parameters.name: Config
parameters.description: Configuration information of the hours of operation. (dict) --- Contains information about the hours of operation. The day that the hours of operation applies to. The start time that your contact center opens. The hours. The minutes. The end time that your contact center closes. The minutes.

nested_params.name: Day
nested_params.description: The day that the hours of operation applies to.

nested_params.name: StartTime
nested_params.description: The start time that your contact center opens.

nested_params.name: EndTime
nested_params.description: The end time that your contact center closes.
